name: dnstwist
label: DNSTwist
description: DNSTwist is a python script used for detecting phishing attacks, typo squatters, and attack domains.

operations.title: Search Registered Domains
operations.description: Displays registered domain names only based on the domain name you have specified.

parameters.title: Domain
parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Name of the domain based on which you want to search for registered domains using dnstwist.
